alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 12:58PM CDT until September 09 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Cocke County in east Tennessee... West central Greene County in east Tennessee... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 158 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parrottsville, or 7 miles northeast of Newport, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Parrottsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
